      • getState

        public Optional<T> getState(UUID aggregateId,
                            java.time.Instant upTo)
        Description copied from interface: StateRepository
        Fetch an object representing the state of the aggregate with this id, at the given moment in time.
        Specified by:
        getState in interface StateRepository<T>
        Parameters:
        aggregateId - The aggregate id to query for.
        upTo - The moment in time (exclusive) at which to obtain the aggregate's state.
        Returns:
        The state of the aggregate, if it existed at that moment.

      • getStates

        public Map<UUID,T> getStates(Collection<UUID> aggregateIds,
                             java.time.Instant upTo)
        Description copied from interface: StateRepository
        Fetch a collection of objects representing the state of the aggregates with the requested ids, at the given moment in time.
        Specified by:
        getStates in interface StateRepository<T>
        Parameters:
        aggregateIds - The aggregate ids to retrieve states for.
        upTo - The moment in time (exclusive) at which to obtain the aggregates' state.
        Returns:
        The aggregates' states, mapped by aggregate id.
